list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: sliced bread browned on both sides by exposure to radiant heat.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she buttered a slice of toast
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô bơ một miếng bánh mì nướng

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: a call to a gathering of people to raise their glasses and drink together in honor of a person or thing, or an instance of drinking in this way.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he raised his glass in a toast to his son
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh giơ kính lên bánh mì nướng cho con trai mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: cook or brown (food, especially bread or cheese) by exposure to a grill, fire, or other source of radiant heat.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he sat by the fire and toasted a piece of bread
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anh ngồi cạnh lửa và nướng một miếng bánh mì

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: drink to the health or in honor of (someone or something) by raising one's glass together with others.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: happy families toasting each other's health
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Gia đình hạnh phúc nướng sức khỏe của nhau

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: (of a DJ) accompany a reggae backing track or music with improvised rhythmic speech.
